desc: Nhau Apparel is a Vietnamese American Clothing Brand based out of Northern California in Sacramento. Nhậu means to drink and eat with friends, family and loved ones in the Vietnamese language. We have tied in fun and motivational phrases into our tshirt and hat designs.

layout.text: Let's nhậu! Bringing Vietnamese words and phrases to the forefront! Represent the culture, the heritage, the prestige and have fun doing it!
